title: Another league bug (What the heck is going on)

embed.description: High FPS whole game. bugging up at the end. Had trouble closing it.

body:
I'll try make this short as possible. I started a Rank/solo game which was all good.

As I got in the game my FPS was dropping down from 50 to 12-10 the whole game. unsure what the problem was I checked to see if i had anything running. After confirming league was only running I noticed the client and the game was using a huge proportion of my memory. Unsure what to do I continued to play till the end. Once the game ended I experienced another weird problem.. After they took out the nexus nothing else popped up.. and I was unable to get out of the game as shown in the video.. It lasted that long that i was able to download a program called (Hyper cams) and recorded the problem

In the video I show the following problems:
I show my internet speed (if that could be a problem)
I show the high usage of memory. (It kinda dropped a little after the game got to this part)
I show what happened once I forced it closed in task manager.


[](https://youtu.be/b_LrwGH4nVU)

What was going on here and is this a common thing to happen. I never really experience lag at all in the game. This was a one time thing where my FPS was dropping like crazy and I have no idea why, Also the ending was super weird too..

replies.body:
Hey there,

Seems like your game failed to display the "Defeat" text, I'm not sure why this happened but it seems the game completed as expected so I don't see an issue here.

Is this a common experience for you?
Sorry about taking 4 months to reply to this but no it was a 1 time thing, also has been fixed now as the defeat or victory screen doesn't require you to click continue anymore as it's auto
